title: Técnico en Administración de Empresas

user_instructor.name: Juan Pepito
user_instructor.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

description: Realizá un curso intensivo, ideal para personas que les gusta el ámbito administrativo o de recursos humanos, que desean seguir mejorando como profesionales, ampliando y actualizando sus conocimientos para poder desempeñarse de mejor manera como empleado en cualquier tipo de empresa.También sirve si ya tenés tu negocio y aprovechá esta actividad de una vez a la semana y aprendé herramientas para optimizar tus recursos.
